title: E79 A Demonic Cold Sore and the World's Smallest Violin
description:
Spoiler alert: We survived Christine's Vegas Bachelorette (despite the waiver we signed at Zak Bagan's Haunted Museum)! Today Christine covers the brutal attack of Mary Vincent and Em discusses Peggy the haunted doll WHO WE TALKED TO...and that's why we drink!
Visit HIMS.com/ATWWD for a trial month of Hims for only $5!
Visit www.tryfirstleaf.com/drink to get your introductory three-pack of wines for only $15!
Skillshare is giving our listeners a one-month free trial of unlimited access to over 17,000 classes. Go to www.skillshare.com slash DRINK to start your free month today!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
